#summary Collection of useful tidbits to remember in the multi-year gaps between when I work on this

== DAYSIM subprograms ==

*Great resource for understanding how programs link together*

[http://web.mit.edu/SustainableDesignLab/projects/Daysim/Daysim_flowchart.html MIT DAYSIM subprograms page]

*radfiles2daysim*

To work, needs to be run with three completely undocumented switches, a la:
{{{
>radfiles2daysim.exe header.hea -d -m -g
}}}

*gen_directsunlight*

If there are no blinds specified, this program doesn't need to be run
